page.title: 04EMPLOYMENT
page.content: ALTHOUGH KILMICHAEL-GLASSARY IS A SMALL RURAL VILLAGE THERE ARE FEW PEOPLE WHO WORK ON THE LAND. THE VILLAGE EXPANDED IN THE 1950'S TO CATER FOR THE WORK THAT WAS CREATED BY THE FORESTRY COMMISSION WITH THE PLANTING OF KILMICHAEL FOREST. TODAY, WITH MUCH OF THE FOREST HAVING BEEN CLEARED, MANY OF THE FORMER FORESTRY WORKERS HAVE FOUND OTHER EMPLOYMENT. A SURVEY, TAKEN BY THE SCHOOL CHILDREN, LISTS SOME OF THE OCCUPATIONS AS FOLLOWS:- {ARCHITECT JOINER DRIVER {FARMER LABOURER NURSE {LAUNDRY WORKER BUILDER MECHANIC {SAWMILL WORKER PAINTER SINGER {TREE FELLER TEACHER MINISTER {DOG BREEDER CLEANER FOREMAN {CLERK SHEPHERD BRICKLAYER
